value.fullName: Living Arrangement changes include a difference in a previously reported Living Arrangement Type (e.g., In-Home to Incarcerated, Attending School to Rehab Facility, etc.)
value.label: Living Arrangement changes include a difference in a previously reported Living Arrangement Type (e.g., In-Home to Incarcerated, Attending School to Rehab Facility, etc.)

value.fullName: Changes to Resources include a decrease or increase in value, change in ownership or the opening or closing of accounts.
value.label: Changes to Resources include a decrease or increase in value, change in ownership or the opening or closing of accounts.

value.fullName: For previously reported Expenses, changes include a change in the amount of an expense or if the expense has ended.
value.label: For previously reported Expenses, changes include a change in the amount of an expense or if the expense has ended.
